content: As a middle-aged white male, I cheer Rep. Hortman’s remarks — they were in no way racist. She merely pointed out the disrespect being shown, for women of color, on the part of her Republican white-male colleagues. The obvious facts that obviously sailed right over their oblivious heads: They were white men.They were in the retiring room.They were playing cards. When did white male Republicans become such fragile little ❄️❄️❄️?
